#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define ll long long int
#define SZ 1234567
#define MOD 1000000007LL

using namespace std;

ll fact[SZ],invf[SZ];
 
ll pw(ll a,ll b)
{
	if (b==0)	return 1;
 	if (b%2)	return a*pw(a,b-1)%MOD;
 	
 	return pw(a*a%MOD,b/2);
}
ll inv(ll x)
{
	return pw(x,MOD-2);
}
 
ll C(ll n,ll m)
{
 	if (m>n)	return 0;
 	
 	ll res=1;
 	res*=fact[n];
 	res*=invf[m];
 	res%=MOD;
 	res*=invf[n-m];
 	
 	return res%MOD;
}

void precompute(ll fact[], ll invf[])
{
	fact[0]=1;
	invf[0]=1;
	for (ll i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		fact[i]=fact[i-1]*i%MOD;
		invf[i]=inv(fact[i]);
	}
}

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	
	ll t;
	cin>>t;
	precompute(fact,invf);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,r;
		cin>>n>>r;
		ll ans = C(n,r);
		cout<<ans<<endl;
		
	}
	
	return 0;
}
